pkgmetadata.longdescription: This library provides an asynchronous DNS resolver on top of GNU ADNS <http://www.chiark.greenend.org.uk/~ian/adns/>. Not all options are supported, but A, MX, and PTR lookups work nicely. There is also support for retrieving generic RR types, CNAMEs, and for NSEC zone walking.
